title: Shikong Ban Ye
synopsis: At the end of the Yuan Dynasty and the beginning of the Ming Dynasty, the world was in chaos. The meteorites that fell from the sky were obtained by Liu Bowen. These stones have incredible energy. Because they can produce greater energy and effect when placed together, Liu Bowen named them "Zhu Pyxi". Among them, there are nine largest fragments, which not only have unique functions, but also can distort and travel through time and space. Liu Bowen ordered the nine stones to be beaten to look like the head of a dragon, with the purpose of concealing the legend. After that, the nine leading figures also played a big role for Zhu Yuanzhang to stabilize the world. During the "Battle of Jingnan", Zhu Di stole nine dragon heads. When the situation was unfavorable, he used them to reverse the situation in one fell swoop, but these nine dragon heads also scattered into different time and space. In the Qing Dynasty more than a hundred years later, a Qing scientist named Ding Quanna discovered the value of dragon heads and the ability to travel through time and space, so he determined to find the whereabouts of dragon heads in all time and space. Until one day Ding Quanna discovered that one of the dragon heads might be in the hands of his descendants, and tried his best to come to the modern age alone. The protagonist of the story, Ding Dana, is a Beijing "Ban'er Ye" living in contemporary Beijing, who is also the tricycle driver of the traditional Beijing tourism project "Hutong Tour". Ding Dana had no father or mother since she was a child. She was brought up by the government and landlord Laizhixin (that is, the second uncle). Laizhixin is the descendant of the Sixth Division of Military Aircraft and Laizhi has been guarding the military aircraft for many years. The six big houses also support the descendants of the Ding family. Ding Dana's father and grandfather died together with the enemy in order to save the time and space from breaking down. They were also locked in time and space, and Dana would never be able to return to the time when his father was alive. Dana's father is also a leader. Since Ding Quanna found the clues of the dragon head, the Ding family seemed to be cursed and had a puzzled relationship with the dragon head and most of them had no good deaths, but only one of them was not affected. This person was Ding Quanna. In order to prevent his last descendant Ding Da from taking the old path of his parents, he has been trying to secretly protect and influence Dana. When Ding Quanna traveled through time and space to find Ding Dana for the first time, he was in a wilderness praying for God’s blessings for his financial situation. Ding Quanna, who loved his son, asked Dana to buy all kinds of modern simple objects for him. Sent to the Qing Dynasty to be dedicated to the emperor in exchange for rewards. Ding Quanna also used these rewards to subsidize the "Sixth Military Aircraft" research institute he was looking for. Although Ding Quanna did not find the whereabouts of the dragon’s head during this trip, he taught Dana how to use the dragon’s head to travel through time and space and trained himself as a helper. Ding Quanna gave Ding Dana a piece called "Laughing Phoenix". "Dana's leader, Ding Dana placed it on the tricycle of his Hutong tour. Coupled with the leg strength Dana has cultivated over the years, this tricycle has also become a weapon for traveling through time and space. However, at the same time that Dana’s financial situation eased the ancestors and grandchildren just to establish trust, Ding Quanna’s former manager of Qing Dynasty research institutions, Zhu Fuguo, appeared. Zhu Fufu and Ding Quanna studied the mystery of the dragon head together and knew the power of the dragon head. However, he was later imprisoned by the Qing court to Tian jail because he was found to be a descendant of Zhu Yuanzhang and had a tendency to rebel. Although his heart was dark but deep According to the mechanical principle, the wooden armored man made from the pyroxene fragments has amazing lethality. Zhu Fugu always wanted to use the power of the dragon head to control the entire time and space. In a sudden flood in Jiangxi, Emperor Qianlong remembered that when Zhu Fugu was an official, he was able to manage water well and asked Ding Quanna to go to the prison to recruit An Zhu Fugu again to serve the Qing court again. Who knew Ding Quanna and Ding Dana brought them Arriving in the prison, he found that Zhu Fugu had already escaped. Ding Quanna came back to the mansion in the middle of the night and encountered a mysterious wooden assassin pretending to be a big-na for assassination. After carefully examining the wooden armored man’s pyroxene joints, Ding Quanna confirmed that this was Zhu Fugu’s work. Once Zhu Fugu escaped The prison must be the first to capture the leader and mock the phoenix. By the time Quanna arrived in modern times, Zhu Fuguo’s wooden armor men had already found Dana, and at the very moment, they all took out their hands to save the ancestors and grandchildren from the danger, but once Zhu Fugu escaped its danger and threat to the leader It is impossible to estimate that since then, in order to prevent the dragon from falling into the hands of Zhu Fuguo, the grandfather and grandson have launched a battle for the dragon across time and space. Yang Lucy is a friend who grew up with Ding Dana, and is also Ding Dana's love object. After graduating from the history department of university, Lucy has been helping in the watch shop of his uncle (the second uncle). By chance, Yang Lucy discovered the secret of Ding Dana. Lucy quickly understood with his sensitivity to history and time. With the important mission of the grandparents of the Ding family, the three of them embarked on a journey to find a protection leader. "Time and Space Banye" is a series of cartoons. The overall story is unfolded under the background of my country's vast historical culture, which constitutes the continuity of the main body of the story; and each intermediate paragraph is relatively independent, with its own scenes and new characters and stories. surroundings. In this way, an artistic structure that is scattered but not messy, complicated but not messy is formed. Compared with other animated cartoons, the audience will experience more of a kind of human spirit, a kind of perseverance and belief of small characters, which are deeply inspired and infected. The ancestors and grandsons of the Ding family fought against the enemy in various historical and cultural backgrounds. Shier went to Dujiangyan in the Qing Dynasty, Shier went to the Terracotta Warriors and Horses of the Qin Dynasty, and Shier went to the vast Inner Mongolian grasslands. Among the mysterious and interesting stories, the beautiful and great Chinese civilization will be revealed one by one.(translated from baidu baike)

title: Shi Er Shengxiao (2009)
synopsis: Emperor Qingyun, who lives in Xuanyuan Palace, accidentally annoyed the water spirit, and the world was flooded. Emperor Qingyun chose twelve animals in the world as the zodiac to save the people from the fire and water. After heavy selection, 12 animals of rat, ox, tiger, rabbit, dragon, snake, horse, sheep, monkey, rooster, dog, and pig are honored to be elected as the Chinese zodiac and ascended to the heaven. Who knows that the animals cannot keep the rules of the heaven. Went into a catastrophe and was demoted to the world by the Jade Emperor. As the head of the twelve zodiac, Zimo has embarked on a long journey. While gathering other zodiac signs, he also gained the trust of mankind. In the end, the twelve zodiac worked together to fight the beasts of the flood as the guardian of mankind. Qingyun emperor, people from all walks of life, animals from all walks of life came to help one after another, and finally won the victory, completed the trial, and the twelve zodiac signs were united and returned to the heaven.(translated from douban)

title: Shi Er Shengxiao (2009)
synopsis: Emperor Qingyun, who lives in Xuanyuan Palace, accidentally annoyed the water spirit, and the world was flooded. Emperor Qingyun chose twelve animals in the world as the zodiac to save the people from the fire and water. After heavy selection, 12 animals of rat, ox, tiger, rabbit, dragon, snake, horse, sheep, monkey, rooster, dog, and pig are honored to be elected as the Chinese zodiac and ascended to the heaven. Who knows that the animals cannot keep the rules of the heaven. Went into a catastrophe and was demoted to the world by the Jade Emperor. As the head of the twelve zodiac, Zimo has embarked on a long journey. While gathering other zodiac signs, he also gained the trust of mankind. title: Pai Le Qi Tong
synopsis: "Pile Qi Tong" (formerly known as "Qi Tong Meng Le") tells the life story of a group of friends on Meng Le Island. It brings happiness, friendship, and dreams to everyone. They play together, learn, and step towards their ideals. Comprehend life. Among these little friends are the magical child, the sweetness of the lion country, the stepping on the farm, the Miruka from the North Pole, the small vole Kubi, the scientist Songson, etc(translated from douban)

title: Daming Wangchao
synopsis: Based on the famous historical work "Those Things in the Ming Dynasty", the animated cartoon "Daming Dynasty". From the birth of Zhu Yuanzhang to the death of Emperor Chongzhen from the Hanging Ming Dynasty. Based on historical data, with the age and specific characters as the main line, it is an animated storytelling In the form of a comprehensive display of the fate of the seventeen emperors and other princes and small figures in the Ming Dynasty, it is especially devoted to officialdom politics, wars, and emperor’s aspirations, and joins the history of political and economic systems and morality at that time. A panoramic display of the fate of the seventeen emperors of the Ming Dynasty and other princes and dignitaries and minor figures, especially the officialdom politics, wars, and the emperor’s aspirations, and joined the historical political and economic system, morality of the time. (translated from douban)

title: Jinpai Xiaohua Tuan
synopsis: The protagonists Zhang Kui, Wang Fan and his good friends live in the modern city of Beijing, living in a traditional alley, and their lives are always surrounded by laughter. The classic talk show performance and the wonderful animation interpretation are combined, with a relaxed and humorous style, creating healthy and happy life elements, and understanding the world (translated from douban)

title: Jingling Ku Xiao Bei
synopsis: In an innocent world, all kinds of flying toys, combat weapons, magic knives, and various robot shapes are left to the children's unlimited reverie. There are distress and happiness, competition, naughty and playfulness among the children. They experienced difficulties and happiness, frustration and confidence as they grew up. The fairy Beckham uses his magical ears to transform into different magical treasures, to bring adventures to his friends, and to help his loyal partner Shuai Ke from the beginning of cowardice, laziness and showy, into a full of children Fun, independent, self-improving, honest and trustworthy, positive and optimistic child (traslated form douban)

title: A Zuo A You De Gushi
synopsis: Ah Zuo and Ah You are just such a pair of twin brothers. The older brother Ah Zuo is calm and his younger brother Ah You is full of fantasies. They live in a warm and happy family of four; their father and mother want to help them get more textbooks. Unexpected knowledge, the family moved to coastal towns in urban and rural areas. From this day on, their embarrassing and ridiculous adventure began... (translated from iqiyi)

title: Zhihui Dao
synopsis: It was about a pupil who accidentally entered the Wisdom Island and used their wisdom to solve the problems step by step and get out of Wisdom Island. Interspersed with various intelligence questions in language, mathematics, physics, and chemistry. Further praise the unity and love. (translated from bilibili)

title: Tongsheng Tong Qi Kan Shijie
synopsis: The story revolves around the campus life of a lovely class of fifth grade pupils. 　　 Xiao An andy (the male protagonist) is an ordinary fifth grade elementary school student who goes to Uni-President Elementary School. One day, when Xiao An came home from school, he found a cardboard box that made a cat meow. Xiao An took the box home, and when she opened it, she found that there was a very cute yellow cat inside. The strange thing is that this cat can speak human words! Xiao An decided to adopt it and named it "Little P". Little P is a cat who likes to eat fish cakes, is lazy, sleeps, and pretends to be smart. Xiao An is already in the fifth grade, and there are only two years left to get along with the pupils. Xiao An decides to take Xiao P to school and after school, with the classmates (cute but with a lot of thoughts Xiao Lin, passionate home Besides, the quiet chicken who likes to show off, the expressionless big Shatou, the dumb Aquan, etc.) go to class together. And Xiao P has become good friends with everyone, and other animals on the campus. Every day, fun and interesting things happen. We all live a colorful, lively and fun campus life together. (translated form douban)

title: Shi Er Shengxiao Zongdongyuan
synopsis: "Legend of the Zodiac: The Twelve Zodiac General Mobilization" is a full three-dimensional animation masterpiece carefully created by Huaqiang Digital Animation Company. The film combines ancient legends and modern concepts to vividly display traditional Chinese culture and give it the characteristics of the new era. The animation of "Legend of the Zodiac: The Twelve Zodiac General Mobilization" is aimed at teenagers aged 8-16, with Chinese culture as the background, Chinese Kung Fu and Zodiac legends as expression elements, and the protagonist’s growth and adventure as the main line , Wonderful Kung Fu action pictures and witty plot run through the whole story. The whole story shows the breadth and depth of traditional Chinese culture, and portrays the protagonist's process of facing difficulties and challenges, constantly conquering himself and gaining perfection.(translated from youk)

title: Shi Er Shengxiao Chuangjianghu
synopsis: "The Legend of the Zodiac: The Twelve Zodiac Entering the Rivers and Lakes" has 52 episodes, each with 12 minutes. The play opens with the Jade Emperor commissioning the Stove Lord to search for the patron saint of the earth. It is a wonderful interpretation of the legend of the Zodiac that overcomes all difficulties and dangers, has withstood many tests, passed the selection of the sage of Mount Tai, and was promoted to the twelve sacred beasts. 　　 The Jade Emperor appointed the Stove Lord to go to the mortal world to find the twelve patron saints of the earth, which made the Stove Lord, who was at the bottom of the immortal class, truly terrified. He acted according to the order, but because of the accidental collision with the little mouse thief Du Laimi, he announced the election of the saint to the world. As a result, the protagonists of the story, the Zodiac signs, all appeared on the stage. With their own yearnings and ideals, they rushed to the election venue: Mount Tai. 　　 The twelve zodiac signs of the wind and dust have experienced different scenery and customs, and learned and comprehended from the anecdotes and difficulties and obstacles along the way, and grew into a model of noble character. 　　 At the Taishan Selection Tournament, they defeated their opponents in their own unique ways, won the respect and recognition of everyone, and finally became the well-deserved "twelve sacred beasts."(translated form douban)

title: Shi Er Shengxiao Kuaile Jie
synopsis: The play tells about a long time ago, there was a place called Happy Street in Jixiang Town, where the mountains and rivers were beautiful and the scenery was pleasant, and the legendary Chinese zodiac lived a happy and fulfilling life here, and there was a show every day. Hilarious and beautiful story. These protagonists are full of enthusiasm for life, and even if they encounter difficulties or setbacks, they will take a positive attitude to solve them, even if the results are not satisfactory. In the face of trivial or major events in life, they confidently staged a "legend" of their own in various ways. Each character in this play has their own survival skills and survival wisdom. Like many ordinary people, they will encounter many surprises, discoveries or adventures in life, and have many beautiful or funny stories. They are full and happy. Live your own every day. The play allows the audience to comprehend the excellent quality advocated by Chinese culture and the profoundness of Chinese culture in the wonderful story. 　　 The use of Chinese elements is the characteristic of this animation work. Both the expression style and the connotation have made a new interpretation of Chinese traditional culture. This work breaks through the previous style and presents the daily life of the Chinese zodiac in traditional culture in a modern way. By telling the humorous stories in it, it depicts the laughter, cursing, and various life styles of the Chinese zodiac, fully showing that they are happy Happy life in the street.(translated from douban)

title: Gang Jia Ka Ka Long
synopsis: Legend has it that in the year 2000 of the universe calendar, a hero and the god of darkness fought a desperate battle. Finally, the power of the hero's collection of twelve zodiac spirit stones sealed the god of darkness. And the twelve zodiac spirit stones also disappeared... the sun and the moon traveled like a white horse, flying by for a thousand years... (translated from bilibili)

title: Liubaorui Dankou Xiang Sheng Ji

title: Mo Jiao Zhentan
synopsis: In the peaceful seaside town "Tuna Town", there is a red-haired teenager Qi Letian. He was inadvertently involved in an intricate theft case. With the help of the innocent and lively angel Jingjing who loves to drink juice, the cold and intelligent robot Huo Xing and other partners, he accidentally assisted the police to detect this evil nature. Criminal case. When everyone thought that everything ended smoothly, the real behind the theft quietly emerged and launched the ultimate challenge to Qi Letian... Should Qi Letian bravely accept the challenge? Still retreat cowardly... The story of the magic horn detective unfolded, and the Chinese young detective who belonged to the world was born. (translated form bilibili)

title: Mo Jiao Zhentan 2 Da Sanjiao Jihua
synopsis: "Magic Horn Detective" is an authentic domestically produced original TV cartoon jointly produced by Yutian Culture and Youyang Media. It tells the story of young Qi Letian and his friends who solve crimes and defeat evil together in the tuna town. The film's excellent production team, real and vivid animation images and ups and downs of the storyline make the audience feel the infinite charm of Chinese animation.(translated from bilibili)

title: Shuihu Zhuan(2010)
synopsis: "Water Margin" is one of the Chinese people's favorite classic novels in vernacular. The plot of the novel is tortuous, the language is vivid, the characters are distinct, and it has a high degree of artistic achievement. This film uses some classic plots with lively and funny cartoon animations to make children feel like they are in the story scene. Each short story is short, exciting, interesting, and profound. It is suitable for children to watch and learn. Watching cartoons and listening to stories can attract children's attention, thereby fostering children's interest in traditional classics and absorbing the essence of precious classics.(translated fro iqiyi)

title: Mo Lin Chuanqi
synopsis: The machine city of Haven has encountered an energy crisis that has never been seen in a thousand years. In an accident, the middle school student Mo Lin became the "chosen one" among the ancestors and possessed the power of a super robot. Therefore, he was given the mission of searching for new energy and protecting energy. In order to prevent the energy of his planet from exhausting, Mo Lin and a few good friends searched for clues to the energy base in a battle of wits with evil organizations, and then saw the magnificent landscape of the four ancient civilizations on the earth in the energy base. Encountered strange gatekeepers, through one after another exciting difficulties.(translated from youku)

title: Mo Lin Chuanqi 2 Yuangu Shenshou
synopsis: Following the relief of the first crisis, the protagonist Mo Lin retrieved new energy to restore the vitality of the past planet. But the good times didn't last long, and Mo Lin once again sensed the instructions of his ancestors Tiangong as the Chosen One. Mo Lin and others learned from the Four Sacred Beasts that Planet Haiwen will once again face a historic test. An ancient city of chaos in ancient times, due to the rebellion of the fierce beast, it broke away from its original trajectory and is moving towards Planet Haiwen. Approaching quickly. (translated form youku)

details.Japanese: 莫麟传奇2 远古神兽

title: Wulin Waizhuan Donghua Ban
synopsis: The background of the plot is during the Yongle period of the Ming Dynasty. The place where the story takes place is called Qixia Town. The main life scene is the Tongfu Inn. In this inn there are restaurants, kitchens, patios, gardens, male and female bedrooms, guest rooms, roofs and streets outside the inn. A yellow-haired girl named Guo Furong entered the rivers and lakes for the first time, owed money, and was trapped in the Tongfu Inn where many capable people were born. The story starts from here, and successively leads to Tong Xiangyu, Guo Furong, Zhu Wushuang, Bai Zhantang, Lu Xiucai, Li Dazui, Mo Xiaobei, as well as Xing Datou, Yan Xiaoliu and Qian Treasurer, several young people with different personalities and charming. The protagonist brings out all kinds of people from the rivers and lakes, leading to a series of joking, vivid and fascinating stories. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Zhonghua Minjian Xiao Gushi
synopsis: Synopsis The film selects representative stories from Chinese folk culture. From the perspective of human nature, it uses animation techniques to deduce the truth that truth, goodness and beauty will definitely defeat false, evil and ugly. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Pingpang Xuanfeng
synopsis: The film describes how the Sky Middle School beats itself and finally wins in a strong table tennis tournament. It shows the unique charm of table tennis and the colorful school life of middle school, and guides children to build a love for the collective and care for others. The noble character. (translated from douban)

title: Caomei Leyuan Zhi Kuaile Shenghuo
synopsis: There is a lush strawberry forest in the beautiful prairie, and a beautiful strawberry paradise in the depths of the forest. There is a group of lively and lovely children living there-careful and sensitive but not squeamish bunny, naughty, childish and cute little wolf, The lively and pushy little frog, the honest and cute but crying snail, the honest and honest and timid little elephant... These children have very different personalities and kind nature. As a result, in the classroom, on the playground, under the hillside, and by the pond, children were left with naughty figures, echoing their laughter...There are hilarious and funny stories, and there are small animals who open the door of wisdom to overcome difficulties. Stories, more adventures full of thrills and excitement.(translated from youku)

title: Caomei Leyuan Zhi Xingfu Shiguang
synopsis: There is a lush strawberry forest in the beautiful prairie, and a beautiful strawberry paradise in the depths of the forest. title: Shaolin Haibao
synopsis: The "Dahe Boy" who has been soaked in the Central Plains Shaolin culture for a long time and the Shanghai World Expo mascot "Haibao" and his companion Fancigar and the dog Douglas, in order to prevent the evil god of darkness from getting colorful beads, protecting Shaolin Temple, passing through time and space tunnels, coming from modern times The story of the ancient middle-earth apprenticeship and martial arts, and fighting against the dark war god (translated from iqiyi)

title: Menghuan Zhuxian

title: Yingxiong Gushi Hui
synopsis: This film is selected from famous stories that have been widely circulated in "Water Margin" and "The Romance of the Three Kingdoms". It is artistically processed on the basis of loyalty to the original work and expressed in the form of animation to make it easier to understand, lively and interesting, and make children understand On the basis of this, he has a strong interest in the essence of traditional Chinese culture.(translated from iqiyi)

title: Xue Hai Zi Zhi Zhengjiu Jiayuan
synopsis: At the foot of the snow-capped mountains, there is an ice-snow village sealed by magical ice. A group of happy snow kids and ice kids live together carefree. One of them is called Carrot Nose. He loves to lie and is timid and cowardly. The children didn't like him. One day, a half-human, half-machine lunatic "Bigfoot" fell from space. He set up his home on the top of a snowy mountain and built a heat meter with all his energy. The instrument thaws the ice river, and the snowy village is in danger. After some bizarre encounters, the cowardly Snow Child Carrot Nose gradually grew up. Instead of asking for perfection, he led the children in the Snow Village to bravely fight against the Bigfoot, and finally succeeded in saving their home.(translated from iqiyi)

title: Di Bi Gou
synopsis: Therefore, many mysterious guests from different planets were gathered. There are humorous magicians, star rock bands, romantic and cute explorers, and noble and elegant cat queens. They are all attracted by this fascinating planet. But behind these travelers are hidden secrets. What is their ultimate purpose in coming to Dibi Star? The lively and lovely Adi will take everyone to find the truth behind the story. Countless treasures are buried under the palace.(translated from bilibili)

title: Congming Baobao Xue YIngyu
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Guo Guo Leyuan
synopsis: In the film, the daily activities of several fruit babies living in the forest are the main clues. Through a series of fragments of fresh and interesting experiences, using anthropomorphic techniques, the small audience is presented with vivid and fun stories. Let children learn how to solve problems from an independent perspective and how to overcome difficulties in a teamwork manner (translated from iqiyi)

title: Ka Ka He Ta De Pengyoumen
synopsis: The story takes place in a small village surrounded by greenery. In this beautiful place, there are several friends with different personalities, full of fantasy and full of curiosity, namely Kaka, Rollo, Lele, Feifei and Yoyo. The stories in the film are adapted from small fragments of children's daily lives. Through the interesting stories between the 5 little friends, the children’s innocent and kind nature is shown, and the principle of getting along with people is told to the little audience. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Ala Fa De Qimiao Shijie
synopsis: The story takes place on the current earth. There is a forest not far from the city. There is a lush and magical tree in the forest. There are a group of kind and brave green elves living in the tree. They have their own names. ——The long-winded but caring elder elders, the brave and strong Alpha, the kind and clever child, the naughty and clever Mumu, the beautiful and intelligent Amei and the innocent and lovely Nini, they together form a happy green elves family . Every green elf has a healthy, positive, and constantly upward mentality. They also have joy, anger, sorrow, and joy like children. They have to learn, like to play, and are innocent and naughty. The difference is that green elf has wings to fly, superpowers and battle magic. (translated from bilibili)

title: Gonglu Q Che Ba
synopsis: Luotun is a remote town with a long history. The residents of the town are all weird modified cars, but I don't know when they have become smoky and bandits are rampant. One day, four partners came. They were Dana and Erna, the double-headed repair car, the old all-around rescue car, the cunning and lazy jack and the vacuum cleaner Nier. They opened a road Q car, professional repair cars. , They sang, danced and played around here, along with the prosperous car bar, scenes of incredible and interesting stories were staged in the highway Q car bar. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Xing Mao Zhi Bianxing Ji
synopsis: An animated cartoon of the same name adapted from Kafka's literary classic "The Metamorphosis". The story of helping the residents of the city through the story of Little Swallow following the Happy Prince ignites hope for the future. Seeing poor Giovanni boarding the magical galaxy train to show the beauty of the galaxy The side. Following Mr. Ying’s understanding and deep cultivation of the secret of success, as well as the viewpoint from the little alien prince, a variety of excellent stories are presented, so that more children and audiences can feel their charm... (translated from tenceng)

title: Xiongmao Zhanshi
synopsis: "Panda Warriors": The panda tribe living deep in the bamboo sea has been living in isolation from the rest of the world. This is a small family composed of five small families: "gold", "wood", "water", "fire" and "earth" The tribes each have the stunt of the Five Elements. This time, the five families were shocked by the awakening of Hundred Eyes at the same time, and sent the most powerful warriors in the family to search for the legendary "Hero Stone" that could prevent the rebirth of the Great Demon; the Pegula and the Mu clan of the gold clan Semba Karen, Sima of Shui, Karaka of Huo, Ba of Tu (translated from baidu baike)

title: Yi Tang Juchang Shuihu Zhuan
synopsis: This film is adapted from "Water Margin", portraying the 108 heroes in the novel one by one, highlighting the belief that justice will prevail. Starting from the aesthetic appeal of children and teenagers, the film has a lively and interesting storyline, magnificent war scenes, easy-to-understand language, vivid characters and lively expressions. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Yi Tang Juchang Sanguo Yanyi
synopsis: The film takes history as the rope and art as the wings. It integrates the history of the end of the Eastern Han Dynasty and the Three Kingdoms era into modern elements, giving people a new understanding and feeling, and allowing children to familiarize themselves with history in happiness. The film uses lively animation methods and incorporates modern elements to be more in line with the way children receive knowledge, making the story of the Three Kingdoms more quickly and easily accepted by children. (translated from iqiyi)

details.Japanese: 亿唐剧场 三国演义

title: Piyingxi Yang Jia Jiang
synopsis: The Yang Family will be a series of heroes and legends. The film tells some characters and events in the early Northern Song Dynasty in the form of shadow puppets. It tells the moving deeds of the four generations of the Yang family defending northern Xinjiang and serving the country with loyalty. (ranslated from iqiyi)

title: Wo Yao Da Guizi
synopsis: The protagonist of the film Doudou has a strong and independent personality. It is a very good playmate with pigs (puppies) and cows (scalpers). Doudou often took pigs, cattle and cattle to fish and hunt, and led a carefree life... 　　 However, the Japanese army invaded China and occupied Central China. A Japanese squad consisting of Sakata, Takahashi, and Nakajima occupied the village where Doudou lived. The devils built artillery towers outside the village and forcibly occupied traffic arteries. In addition to monitoring and patrolling, they also carried out raids on the villages, greedily plundering the villagers' property, and using force to oppress the villagers to serve them. The villagers have lived a miserable life ever since. In order to protect the villagers and resist aggression, Doudou and the villagers rose up to resist, and did not fear in the face of the greedy and vicious devil soldiers. The film uses humorous and funny techniques to show the bravery, tact and courage of the youth, using various methods, uniting various forces, and cleverly dealing with the Japanese team, which has repeatedly failed the conspiracy plans of the Japanese army. And it caused a series of troubles to the devils, and the devils who played around made them tired.(translated from iqiyi)

title: Sheng Shi Qibing
synopsis: In order to save his parents, Zhou Xiaohuo took the upgraded Bakugan and embarked on an adventure. Coming together with the other 5 partners under the arrangement of fate, they defeated Seymour with six powerful Bakugan. (translated from douban)

title: Ke Er Lixian Ji
synopsis: This film tells the story of a 21st-century urban teenager, Hu Xiaoke, who uses the time-space watch invented by the scientist grandfather to travel through various time and space. The series is based on wonderful events and unsolved mysteries in ancient and modern Chinese and foreign history. In the meantime, through funny, fighting, war and science fiction, knowledge of history, geography, culture and science are interspersed. The first season of "Heroes from Ancient Times" tells the story of Hu Xiaoke and Huo Qubing, a famous general in the Western Han Dynasty.(translated from douban)

title: Chaoji Youyou
synopsis: Because of the transfer of his parents' work, Yoyo came to a new and prosperous town. The people in the town are simple and honest, and the new neighbors are kind and enthusiastic. Soon, Yoyo made many good friends. In the process of adapting to the new environment, various small frictions occurred between Yoyo and his parents and between the children, which also brought a series of interesting stories... (translated from iqiyi)

title: Piyingxi Suitang Yanyi
synopsis: "The Romance of the Sui and Tang Dynasties" is a novel with both heroic legends and historical romances. It is also called one of the best novels by many readers. The plot of the film is popular and the characters are distinctive. (translated from bilibili)

title: Jia You Jiu Shen
synopsis: It tells the experience of a little Bacchus who became immortal in ancient China and traveled to modern times, living in a modern Chinese family. The whole play uses wine culture as a link, and revolves around a series of short stories between the Dionysian and this family and neighbors, deduces the conflicts and mutual fusion of wine cultures of different eras and different regions, and shows the traditional Chinese wine culture.(translated from iqiyi)

title: A Te De Qihuan Zhi Lu
synopsis: In the fantasy world of Utopus, a beast born from an eggshell, Duo Le, accidentally traversed the earth, and accidentally brought the pointed-eared orphan Art and the overbearing child Wang Leihu back to Wu To the mainland. The genius magical girl Xini who met by chance led them to find the way back, but found that this accident had been predicted thousands of years ago. The weak and autistic Arter was born with the great mission of saving the Uto Continent. Under the rule of the You Clan Moza, this beautiful and magical continent has become misty and plundered. Art’s biological mother has also been Moza was imprisoned in the Sky City. With family and friendship... (translated form iqiyi)

title: Da Qi He Tonghua Zhen
synopsis: Fairytale Town has a beautiful environment, with Fantasy Sea and Rose Mountain nearby. Li Daqi and his friends are students in the Primary School of Fairy Tale Town. They encounter various troubles in their daily study and life, and this has led to a series of interesting stories. (translated from tenceng)

title: Xiha Youji
synopsis: In order to inherit the great cause of the ancestors, Sun Wukong’s N-generation descendant, Sun Yikong, drove the floating island and the small spacecraft Hama P-1, leading the partners on a thrilling and exciting journey of fantasy exploration again, looking for 100,000 answers to why kingdom. On the road to solving difficult problems, they bravely overcome crises again and again, and constantly learn and progress. It was only released when they arrived in the kingdom of mystery, and the 100,000 answers to why have been solved one by one on the path they pursued. (translated from douban)

title: Ji Dou Shi Yun Hui
synopsis: Ji Dou and his friends Sir, Doctor and Zhu Zhu were sucked into the mysterious ancient country of Atlantis in the deep sea by magical powers. They knew that Ji Dou was the envoy to save the earth. Since then, Ji Dou and his friends have gone to various countries to compete in sports to win the golden grass that is used to heal the earth. Facing strong opponents from various countries, Ji Dou and her friends are fortunate enough to be joined by a new member Xiaobi from Beijing, China. She is as gentle and enthusiastic as a traditional Chinese girl. She is also the apprentice of Jazz's uncle, proficient in Chinese sports and kung fu , Especially good at light work; during the trip, Xiaobi helped Ji Dou and others escape danger with good skill many times, and also introduced them to various Chinese culture, customs and nature(translated from bilibili)

title: Senlin Li De Gushi
synopsis: In the big forest, there are a group of happy little animals. There are blossoming little bunnies that are kind-hearted and sentimental, there are little foxes who think they are smart and smart, there are docile goats, cocoa, and there are many simple and honest little bears. (translated from bilibili)

title: Kuaile Wangzi
synopsis: Before, when I was alive with a human heart," the statue said, "I don't know what tears are, because I lived in a free and easy palace at that time, which was a place where sorrow could not enter. People accompany me to play in the garden during the day, and at night I lead the dance in the hall. There is a tall fence along the garden, but I never thought that there would be something on the fence. Everything around me was so beautiful. My servants call me the Happy Prince. Indeed, if pleasure is happiness, then I am really happy. I just live and die like this. And now I am dead, they have stood me so high here, so that I can see all the ugliness and poverty in my city, even though my heart is made of lead, I can't help crying. " (translated from youku)

title: Datou Chuang Tian Guan
synopsis: This film depicts a folk picture scroll from the Qianlong period. Poor and lazy, the little rich man in Xianglu County has a big head and got involved in a murder case. Qian Datou won the lawsuit by virtue of his cleverness, but found that the "murderer" he risked to save was the current prince. As a result, he got a blessing in disguise and was named the county magistrate of the Seventh Incense Burner. Qian's head originally thought that it would be so prosperous, but found that the officialdom was dim, and the people were hard to get justice and miserable. The county magistrate Qian wanted to appeal to the people, get justice, and make a small fortune incidentally, but I am afraid there are still many hurdles to break. (translated from youku)

title: Congming Chongwu Dan
synopsis: This film tells the story of a cute little girl Tangtang who has always had the title of "little fool" in the kindergarten. In order to get rid of this "honorary title", she bought a "smart pet egg" from the Internet that can make people smart. But after I bought it, I found out that this little egg was stupid than Tangtang himself, and he couldn't even speak enough. It needed the owner to develop his own intelligence to use it. Tangtang got angry and named it Benben. Later, Tangtang gradually grew up in the process of developing intelligence for it, and she has long since gotten rid of the title of "little idiot"! Since then, Benben has been by Tangtang's side, and Tangtang finally understands that growing up is such a happy thing.(translated from youku)

title: Congming Chongwu Dan Zhi Qihuan Lucheng
synopsis: It tells that for the title of "little stupid", the cute little girl Tangtang bought a kind of "smart pet egg" that can make people smart. But after I bought it, I found out that this little egg was stupid than Tangtang himself, and he couldn't even speak enough. It needed the owner to develop his own intelligence to use it. Tangtang got angry and named it Benben, and since then, he and Benben have embarked on a long road of growth. Finally, with the help of Tangtang and his brother, Benben finally activated the intelligence program and became a real smart pet egg. The animation also adopts the very popular way of explaining interesting little knowledge in today's TV shows, introducing a little interesting knowledge related to the story, enriching the content of the film, and expanding the audience's knowledge, so that it can be entertained at the same time. .. (translated from youku)

details.Japanese: 聪明宠物蛋之奇幻旅程

title: Congming Chongwu Dan Xue Shuxue
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Huanbao Teqin Zu
synopsis: "Environmental Protection Team" is a web animation produced by AOL in the United States and Xingxing Animation in China in 2010. German supermodel Gisele Bundchen led Ariksha, Jisha, Wu Li and Sophie to form an environmental protection team. They are all heroines with superpowers and dedicated to environmental protection. They appear in the public eye as models all over the world, to promote the importance of environmental protection to the world, especially young girls. Each episode of the cartoon talks about an environmental issue, such as climate change, poaching, and pollution issues. It calls on everyone to apply environmental protection knowledge in their daily lives and start environmental protection from small things.(translated from baidu baike)

title: Qi Qu Da Shijie
synopsis: Take the treasures, chess, and little guys in the funny club as the main characters, take everyone to travel the world together, telling various anecdotes and historical legends. Among them, there are introductions to tourist attractions and cultural relics, stories about the invention of common objects in life, and introductions to historical events. It is a large encyclopedia for children to enrich their knowledge and broaden their horizons. (translated form pptv)

title: Zhui Feng Shaonu
synopsis: This film tells the story of three sisters in the lanes of the old city of Shanghai who pursue fashion trends and are full of personality. They play a humorous, relaxed, happy, warm and harmonious story in the family.(translated from bilibili)

title: Lixian Xiao Qibing
synopsis: The story of this film takes place in a small county in China in the 1940s. Two brothers, "Huhu" and "Dandan", were temporarily adopted by the owner of the "Hongyun Hotel" in the county, "Hu Yuyuan" because their mother was visiting a doctor outside. Since it has been a long time... (translated from bilibili)

title: Shūguǒ wángguó lìxiǎn jì
synopsis: An eight-year-old girl, one day through a mysterious medium, came from her home to a different world separated from human society. This is a world of fruit and vegetable kingdom. (translated from biliili)

title: Kongque Xinan Fei
synopsis: The film is adapted from a real story. It mainly tells the story of a girl from Ningbo, Lan Fang, who supports her education alone, goes deep into the Miao Village in the southwestern mountains, and devotes her youth to education in the mountainous area. Finally, as a people's teacher, Lan Fang is rooted in the Miao Village. (translated from acfun)

title: Wai Xing Tu Bang Bang
synopsis: "Alien Rabbit Bang Bang" tells an interesting story of a magical rabbit from an alien planet with special functions-Bang Bang came to a family in Ningbo and lived happily with this family. It is a good entertaining and entertaining story. Animation series. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Han Han E Yu Gaga Ya
synopsis: In a small town called "Goose Castle", there are animals such as geese, bears, old tortoises, bunny and pigs. They lead a peaceful and happy life, but with the birth of "babies", Growing up, the peaceful life of animals is broken, children’s education, neighborhood relations and small town life have changed...Although it is a cartoon, it reflects today’s rapidly changing society and inspires people to think deeply about life. (translated from bilibili)

title: Caihong Gui
synopsis: A rainbow fell on a little turtle's egg, and the egg miraculously hatched a little turtle with a rainbow-patterned back shell, which was unusual. And it was this extraordinary that when Xiao Caihong was born, she was treated as a little monster. His mother didn't recognize it, she was alone and lived a life of nomadism. He has experienced many sad things, but he also made many friends like the painter little raccoon. In the end, Rainbow sacrificed his bright colors on his back to help the raccoon realize his wish for a painting exhibition. Although the rainbow lost its bright and beautiful colors, it finally returned to the mother he missed day and night.(translated from bilibili)

title: E Bao Xiao Zhandui
synopsis: The animals living in Gosberg Village lead a peaceful and peaceful life. However, the seemingly peaceful life is destined to be broken by a new crisis. All this must start with an ancient prophecy. According to legend, it is recorded in the big goose calendar that when three stars circle the moon, Ebo Village will face three different challenges. The people who can cope with this test are the four teenagers living in Ebao Village. The old man in the village, the Kung Fu master "Master Dog" and the old tortoise "Grandpa Turtle" who loves to dance began to look for the four legendary teenagers, and their eyes turned to the famous naughty bags "Bentou", "Pangdun" and "Xiaobao" in Goose Castle And the bad boy "Jay"(translated from iqiyi)

title: Wanhuatong Li De Shijie
synopsis: In a quiet library, there are rows of bookshelves and neat books. On the wall, on a table, a thick book, a thick notebook, and a kaleidoscope lying horizontally by the wall. Little friends often have conflicts and problems, but they use their wisdom and courage to solve these problems, unite tightly, and strive for a beautiful and happy life. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Douya Xiansheng
synopsis: Mr. Bean sprouts graduated and returned to his hometown of Rainbow Village. The villagers are being harassed by the Great Demon King Abu and his little followers. Mr. Bean sprouts used his knowledge with the help of his friends to successfully solve the tricks of the big demon every time and defend Rainbow A peaceful life in the village. For more wonderful videos of Mr. Bean Sprouts, please follow CNTV animation (translated from iqiyi)

title: Fandou Dou
synopsis: The distant planet Tipping Star, because of blindly pursuing development and neglecting environmental protection, the planet is about to be destroyed. Lao Dou, a scientist who always advocates environmental protection, has discovered the danger even if it comes, but no one believes it. Seeing that everything was irreversible, Lao Dou decided to take the children away. Worried that the terrifying reality will bring psychological shadows to the children, Lao Dou cleverly arranged his escape into a space trip. During the voyage, the dumpling beans conscientiously cleaned up space junk, and also fought fiercely with space robbers Wah Ya Ya and Chacha.(translated from douban)

title: Gu Gu Dong
synopsis: On a mysterious planet, there are a group of Drumdong people living in a state similar to the primitive period of mankind. They live a simple life of self-sufficiency, men plowing and women weaving, not only that, they also have to be always on time... (translated from bilibili)

title: Duo Lai Mi Julebu
synopsis: "Doraimi Club" is a cartoon about English teaching. It incorporates common spoken English into music, nursery rhymes, nursery rhymes, and adds some interesting elements, such as reading pictures and literacy. In addition, there will be education about life manners. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Huainan Zi
synopsis: With the original structure of the story, the historical figures are restored from the difficult classical works one by one full of humanity and vivid life, and the core idea of the original "inaction" is interpreted from a contemporary perspective. It provides an excellent way for audiences, especially young people, to directly experience the charm of traditional Chinese culture. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Tiantian Hao Haizi
synopsis: The protagonist of the story, Li Tiantian (天天) and Li Beilei (贝bei) are a pair of siblings. Sister Beibei is a third-year student in the experimental middle school. My younger brother Tian Tian is a fourth-grade student in Sunshine Elementary School, introverted and shy, shy and timid. Tiantian and Beibei often encounter some uncivilized phenomena in daily life, and at the same time they lack common sense of civilized etiquette. Under the guidance and prompts of teachers, parents and even strangers, Tiantian and Beibei continued to use civilized etiquette to regulate their own behavior, got rid of many bad habits in life, and became good children with polite and decent behavior. Because of their outstanding performance in school, Tiantian and Beibei became the most recognized pioneers of civilized etiquette. They shared with everyone the problems they encountered and the solutions, making the students around them pay more and more attention to their words and deeds.(translated from youku)

title: Xing Mao Wenhua Da Jiangtang Zhi Wenhua Gushi
synopsis: "Cultural Stories of the Star Cat Culture Lecture Hall" is adapted from Cai Zhizhong’s excellent comic works sold over 30 million copies, and selects the essence of ancient Chinese sages such as Confucius, Mencius, Laozi, Zhuangzi, Liezi, etc., using two-dimensional rendering technology to interpret ancient China The magnificent chapter of the saint reproduces the profound and profound ancient culture of the Chinese scholars in an easy-to-understand, vivid and lively manner. A new interpretation of this animated TV series that every Chinese must watch.(translated from baidu)

details.Japanese: 星猫文化大讲堂之文化故事

title: Chongwu Zhuangyuan Jizhen Shi
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Chongwu Zhuangyuan Jízhen Shi Zhi Xiong Boshi Di Yinmou
synopsis: The Animal Kingdom has a pet farm emergency room. After the flood, the doctors found that the animals did not understand the protective measures when natural disasters came. Therefore, the doctors decided to volunteer for everyone to help protect themselves in the event of a disaster. Unexpectedly, after the tutoring class was over, there was another earthquake in the animal kingdom. The animals were lucky enough to escape the disaster by relying on this knowledge. (translated from iqiyi)

details.Japanese: 宠物庄园急诊室之熊博士的阴谋

title: Huyou Jiangtan
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Jiankang Zhiduoxing
synopsis: Health Zhi Duo Xing is a large-scale domestic animation series with the theme of "66 Health Literacy of Chinese Citizens". Each episode takes about 10 minutes. In the first episode, you can learn some life knowledge.(translated fromm bilibili)

title: Lan Mao You Er Yingyu 300 Ju
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Sanzijing Li De Gushi
synopsis: This film interprets the "Three Characters Classic" in the form of a story, starting with the first story told by Budai monk. Kong Rong, a native of Lu in Yuzhou in the late Eastern Han Dynasty, is the twentieth grandson of Confucius. He is honest in nature and knows how to be modest since he was a child. , One day someone sent a basket of pears. His father asked Kong Rong to pick one to eat first. Kong Rong picked the youngest one. His father thought it was strange and asked him: "Son, why don't you pick the big pears? "Kong Rong replied: "I am the youngest, I should eat the youngest brother, who is older than me, and I should eat the bigger one." When the people in the clan knew this, they all looked at him differently. The story is not finished, I hope these allusions Can play a profound educational significance for children.(translated from tenceng)

title: Fei Mao Zheng Zhuan
synopsis: A short story by Fat Cat Performing Arts makes you happy! The chubby fat cat always loves to mess things up and can't handle it, but you have to fall in love with this cute and angry fat cat. (translated from bilibili)

title: Mai Ge Chuanqi
synopsis: This film is composed of a series of short stories. It tells the story of Mai Ge, the cousin of the main character in the tail Phantasy, Mai Ge is a curious, wise, fashionable, and energetic. People, he and his little brother live happily in their own cabin. They have many friends. Mai Ge is also a genius inventor. He can always make some weird inventions. Some inventions are very useful, some Inventions are very cool, and some inventions are a little bit dangerous. My younger brother admires Mai Ge very much and uses him as an idol. On the other hand, the big bad wolf who lives in the city mixes with his weasel brother but swayed against Mai. Ge hates his teeth, because Mai Ge always keeps their wicked plans from succeeding every time, so they get disgraced, so mixed and shaking always work hard to design some traps to harm Mai Ge and brother, of course, in the end The ending is still a failure.(translated from tenceng)

title: Yongzhe Xueyuan
synopsis: Dinosaur Valley is a mysterious star field with many relics. Ancient institutions and treasures are hidden in the ruins. In addition, the ancient dragon gods, bean gods and dark gods in myths and legends once fought in the dinosaur valley and left behind After their traces, today's Dinosaur Valley is a paradise full of mystery, adventure, joy and miracles, and the "Brave Academy" located in the Dinosaur Valley is a school for cultivating brave men, which is famous for all the stars. Pointy Run and Rolling Round are the students who have just obtained the qualifications to enter the academy. Under the leadership of Teacher Tie Piyong and Dean Moduo, they help the residents in Dinosaur Valley solve various commissioned problems, explore various treasures, and dig ancient times. History, search for ancient relics, and study hard to become a brave.(tenceng)

title: Chokkan × Algorhythm♪ 3rd Season
synopsis: 3rd season of Chokkan × Algorhythm♪.

details.Japanese: 直感×アルゴリズム♪ 3rd Season

title: Jin Huli He Fen Fenghuang
synopsis: Golden Retriever Fox Jin Duoduo likes to steal chickens. Pink Phoenix is a chicken that wants to be a phoenix, flying freely in the sky. The fox and the chicken are a pair of natural enemies, wit and courage, humorous and interesting. (translated from tenceng)

title: Ao Ao Long
synopsis: The animation of the complete works of Aoaolong tells about the Aoaolong is a cute little dragon, he comes from the Longyuan galaxy. Aoaolong likes to invent all kinds of weird things, but he is very timid and is often ridiculed by other dragons. In order to prove his bravery, Aoaolong led his friends to the dragon ship as a space cruiser. Aoaolong accidentally started the dragon boat. The dragon boat took the Aoaolong to a place called Lubei Country. In this unfamiliar place, Aoaolong met a third-grade kid, Luke. The character of Luke is very similar to that of Aoaolong. Because I was timid, I was often teased by my classmates. Similar experiences made Aoaolong and Luke quickly become good friends. Aoaolong's small invention has helped Luke overcome difficulties time and time again. In the end, Luke became a brave and confident child. (translated from tenceng)

title: Lan Juxing He Ludou Sha
synopsis: The mung bean shark living in the cold and terrible shipwreck and his men Lucky and Jinbao are determined to occupy the beautiful coral village and eat the fish residents in the coral village. The little blue whale who was brought back to Coral Village by a thousand-year-old turtle from the outside world was a cute and kind child. Faced with the ferocity of the green bean shark and his men, the little blue whale was eating a nutritious marine food. After the seaweed, it will become a powerful blue giant, chasing away the green bean shark and his men, and restoring the tranquility of the beautiful coral village. (translated from pptv)

title: Xingxi Baowei Zhan
synopsis: In 2596 AD, humans moved to the rich and beautiful Kaku Star, living a peaceful and happy life under the protection of the power of 5 crystals. The dark forces of the universe covet the powerful energy of the crystal energy stone, and their greedy clutches extend to the star of Kaku, trying to use the power of the crystal energy stone to dominate the universe. The tranquility was broken by evil, four crystal energy stones fell into the hands of the dark forces, and the last crystal energy stone was in danger. At the critical juncture, five brave children stepped forward to form the Jingneng team, vowing to defend Kakuxing with their lives. Crystal warriors drive crystal fighters to fight bravely, transform into a heroic form to fight to the death, and summon robots for a fatal blow! Growing up in battles, Jingneng fighters feel the true meaning of unity and friendship, and learn to summon Jingneng with the power of heart. A battle between justice and evil begins! (translated from bilibili)

title: Mugua Mugua
synopsis: Long ago, there was a paradise called Papaya Village, where people lived in peace and harmony. The story revolves around the experiences of Zhu Jiao, Qingyi, Zhiming, and Little Pig. Each episode revolves around an idiom. Through a few small protagonists go to the sky to help the elderly and children, naughty and disruptive, timid and fearful of cowardice and inaction, and bad guys. The personal experience of endless battles uses idioms to interpret a series of humorous and interesting stories. 　　 A lot of cute points.(translated from douban)

title: San Zhi Laoshu Zuijiu Ji
synopsis: Japanese sake, Chinese Erguotou, American whiskey, who is better? After watching the story of the three rats stealing alcohol and drinking in the film, you will understand that it is super funny! (translated from baidu baike)
